docs.title: Backend
docs.text:
This is the backend service for the wallet app.

visit technical documentation here

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
To get started, see

  • Getting Started

  • Pushing to Github

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Getting started
docs.text:
This getting started guide will run through

  1. how to install the required requirements
  2. how to start the app

* note: all commands are meant to be executed from the root directory of the app.

docs.title: Install requirements
docs.text:
This is to install all required requirements for the app

MacOS/ LinuxWindows 
sh scripts/install-requirements.sh

todo

docs.title: Spin up the services
docs.text:
This is to run the app

MacOS/ LinuxWindows 
sh scripts/start.sh

todo

The console should now show you where to find the website. If all is done right, this page should load correctly.

docs.title: Live documentation
docs.text:
When app is running locally, use the following (depending on preferences) for live documentation

  • Swagger UI

  • Re-docs

docs.title: Pushing to Github
docs.text:
This is to push all code to github, including source code as well as documentation.

* note: all commands are meant to be executed from the root directory of the app.

MacOS/ LinuxWindows 
sh scripts/push-all.sh

todo
